Important Announcements
PeopleSoft Navigation Has Changed
If you have questions about how to navigate the Fluid interface, please refer to the Fluid Navigation Video Tutorial.
Annual Deadlines for Adopting Course Materials
Per AS-945-22, the Registrar's Office will notify faculty and publish a calendar of course material adoption deadlines for all terms of the approaching academic year by the second Friday of each January.
